annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Oct. 21, 1975, D.C. Law 1-23, title VII, § 701(b), 22 DCR 2115
June 15, 1976, D.C. Law 1-70, title VI, § 602, 23 DCR 549
repealed pursuant to § 305 of D.C. Law 11-111

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 305 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
